classification.task_goal: Generate profitable trade-ups for CS:GO skins considering float ranges and prices.
primary_constraints: Trade-up must consist of 10 skins of the same rarity.
Trade-up cost is the sum of all prices of the selected skins.
Average price of the trade-up skin is calculated based on the result skins' prices and their collection percentages.
Skin prices depend on their float values.
classification.reasoning: The user identified a flaw in the AI's approach regarding the float ranges and provided clarification on how to handle them, indicating a successful repair of the task constraints.
